oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Silver Dollar Saloon at 2nd Avenue and Broadway, c.1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the restored Silver Dollar Saloon at Broadway and 2nd Avenue. In the 1970s, the building became the site of the office and book store for Historic Nashville, Inc. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, c.1970s. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
